title: Vasaloppet de la Sergerie
text:
Vasaloppet de la Sergerie is a <a href="cross-country%20skiing%20%28sport%29">cross-country skiing</a> event held around <a href="Le%20Norv%C3%A9gien">Le Norvégien</a> in the <a href="Quebec">Quebec</a> province in Canada. The event was first held in 2007.
Held in February or early March, the event is named after <a href="Vasaloppet">Vasaloppet</a> in Sweden.
